metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2231 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.10').
